pages.text: Find yourself a crafting bench and try forming the residue over an iron ingot. The residue seems to bind well with iron creating a sturdy material.

Ok one more step to further refine the matter. Now that you have a dimensional ingot, let's see if we can purify it and draw out some of its dimensional energy. To do this we will want something conductive.
A couple nuggets of gold and a redstone in a crafting bench with a dimensional ingot should do the trick.
